item.title: Mikka's happenings ğŸ“’ #179
item.description:
I used to know a kid back in highschool, he got from a rough place and managed to leave highschool early to pursue his career in music and beat making. Years ago when I last saw him he decided to chat with me about life and such and showed that heâ€™ll be travelling outside the country to work for a label or something and was proud of his gym progress getting jacked.

I sometimes wonder what happened to him, we never exchanged phone numbers nor were we really considered friends. I hope life is treating him well now and that he made his dreams come true.

Web3 mostly gets a bad reputation because people think of the word â€œcryptoâ€ as â€œcryptocurrencyâ€ even though cryptocurrency does not play a role in this at all.

item.title: Mikka's happenings ğŸ“’ #76
item.description:
I apologize for my frequent ramblings. I do not want to come over like this to others.

I have been making plan B's for continuing to live. It's not my top priority as plan A defeats plan B. I love all my friends.

item.title: Mikka's happenings ğŸ“’ #75
item.description: As I've stated before, I do not want to reach my birthday. It's of no use, nothing to celebrate other than my misery. I hope to donate my savings and checking balances toward health organisations that might be able to make a change.

item.title: Mikka's happenings ğŸ“’ #74
item.description: I know I will disappoint everyone around me for this. But I suppose I'll be selfish this time. Once I am ready, I will say a final goodnight.

item.title: Mikka's happenings ğŸ“’ #72
item.description: I have been feeling very depressed lately. It's becoming a problem. Departing without anyone's consent might be the best option. I need to think of a good date when everyone is gone that I can go depart peacefully. I've considered a lot of options; drugs, auto-mutilation, or departing via train. It's all so exhausting.

item.title: Mikka's happenings ğŸ“’ #66
item.description: I hope to work on my school and some blog articles the coming days.

item.title: Mikka's happenings ğŸ“’ #64
item.description: Going to a hairdresser with my mom soon. I hope to get a nice haircut or such as a haircut makes all the difference. Last time (when I was growing out my hair) the barber messed up and gave me a very masculine cut. I cried my way home and at home itself. This was almost a year ago, I have been too afraid to get a haircut ever since then as it felt like my hair got assaulted. Will send an email to my clinic too. I keep forgetting to do so.

item.title: Mikka's happenings ğŸ“’ #63
item.description: I cleaned my room. It frees up your mind.

item.title: Mikka's happenings ğŸ“’ #61
item.description: I will be heading to bed, goodnight.

item.title: Mikka's happenings ğŸ“’ #60
item.description:
Played a lot of videogames today with a friend. It was fun.

Still feeling really dysphoric on a daily basis. Why must I feel such a way constantly?

I hope to get in contact with my clinic soon. The doctors can fix you, they say.

item.title: Mikka's happenings ğŸ“’ #58
item.description:
Goodnight kind and harsh world. I will stay ambivalent about you.

Goodnight to all my friends aswell. And goodnight everyone who have been suffering through the same pain.
